'''''Badlands Adventurer''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Blessed Hamada]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete eight [[Time Trial Challenge]]s in [[Gavireh Lajavard]] and [[Realm of Farakhkert]] in the [[Girdle of the Sands]].
